ConnectorLabel.description: The name of the connector. The name is unique for each ConnectorRegistration in your AWS account.
ConnectorLabel.markdownDescription:
The name of the connector. The name is unique for each ConnectorRegistration in your AWS account.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 512  
Pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9][\w!@#.-]+  
Update requires: Replacement

ConnectorProvisioningType.description: The provisioning type of the connector. Currently the only supported value is LAMBDA.
ConnectorProvisioningType.markdownDescription:
The provisioning type of the connector. Currently the only supported value is LAMBDA. 

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9][\w!@#.-]+  
Update requires: No interruption

ConnectorProvisioningConfig.description: Contains information about the configuration of the connector being registered.
ConnectorProvisioningConfig.markdownDescription:
Contains information about the configuration of the connector being registered.

---

Required: Yes  
Type:   
Update requires: No interruption

Description.description: A description about the connector that's being registered.
Description.markdownDescription:
A description about the connector that's being registered.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: [\s\w/!@#+=.-]*  
Update requires: No interruption

ConnectorProvisioningConfig.description: Contains information about the configuration of the connector being registered.

Lambda.description: Contains information about the configuration of the lambda which is being registered as the connector.
Lambda.markdownDescription:
Contains information about the configuration of the lambda which is being registered as the connector.

---

Required: No  
Type:   
Update requires: No interruption

ConnectorProvisioningConfig.markdownDescription:
Contains information about the configuration of the connector being registered.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

LambdaConnectorProvisioningConfig.description: Contains information about the configuration of the lambda which is being registered as the connector.

LambdaArn.description: Lambda ARN of the connector being registered.
LambdaArn.markdownDescription:
Lambda ARN of the connector being registered.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 512  
Pattern: arn:*:.*:.*:[0-9]+:.*  
Update requires: No interruption

LambdaConnectorProvisioningConfig.markdownDescription:
Contains information about the configuration of the lambda which is being registered as the connector.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

ConnectorArn.description: The arn of the connector. The arn is unique for each ConnectorRegistration in your AWS account.
ConnectorArn.markdownDescription:
The arn of the connector. The arn is unique for each ConnectorRegistration in your AWS account.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 512  
Pattern: arn:*:appflow:.*:[0-9]+:.*  
Update requires: No interruption
